sentences.english: He spent a lot of time playing in the forests of Huayin Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 他時常在華陰山的森林裏玩。

sentences.english: During the Han dynasty， about two thousand years ago， to the north of Huayin Mountain， there lived a family called Yang.
sentences.chinese: 兩千年前的漢代，華陰山北面，住着一姓楊的農戶。

sentences.english: Founded in Huayin mu Guolin Technology Demonstration Park has begun to take shape.
sentences.chinese: 公司創建的華陰萬畝果林科技示範園已初具規模。
